profile:
At Laric Furniture & Kitchen Refinishing in Port Moody, we serve anyone who needs furniture or kitchens restored. Our clients include cabinet makers, interior designers, upholsterers, piano restoration companies, restaurants, schools, insurance companies, local governments and private individuals. We specialize in repairs and touch-ups, refinishing, cabinets and antiques. Our owner, Daniel, has a passion for working with wood and personally ensures quality.

Call us to make an appointment; due to the nature of our work, we often are out of the shop.
